name: RB ZONE Electronics Super Store
address: 24, Bhoj Marg, Freeganj, Madhav Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: Delayed product delivery.  Salesman not aware of product and also misguided to my questions. When asked for money refund, said 2% will be cut, had to wait for washing machine and when got delivered, had scratches inside the drum rim BUT they considered the issue, resolved it timely and got my machine replaced. Happy with the service.
Nice customer satisfaction ,I am regular customer of your freeganj shop we always like to come here for our all needs

I recently purchased a laptop from this store, but they did not provide a laptop bag despite multiple requests. I was disappointed with the service and lack of customer support. I would advise potential buyers to clarify all inclusions before making a purchase. Not at all satisfied

name: Lotus Electronics
address: Vishala Area, 56/2, Dewas Rd, Rishi Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: Lotus Electronics is provide best service and quality. Mr. Ajay Yadav and hitesh tomar are best department manager in Lotus Electronics ujjain is the best employee and attender he gives us a perfect knowledge of product and cooperative person. Thanks Lotus Electronics and Ajay Yadav ji also thanks hitesh tomar ji.

I'm absolutely thrilled with my recent purchase from Lotus. I bought a LG AC and it exceeded my expectations.
The product arrived quickly, was well-packaged, and the quality is top-notch.
Govind Sharma assisted us well throughout the process.

I purchased a laptop from lotus Ujjain, the staff was very courteous and helpfull. Ms. Diksha attended my purchase, the chosen model was not available in store but she arranged it from another store with the help of her supervisor Mr Shubham who made it happen on the same day. I really appreciate the assistance provided by both of them. Cheers !!

This store is a go-to for all things electronics. The staffs are  incredibly helpful in explaining the features and help make an informed decision. The store's layout is organised, making it easy to compare different models. The store had a wide selection of appliances, and the prices were competitive. Highly recommended for anyone in need of quality electronics appliances.

name: Croma - Ujjain
address: Shivansh Business Park, Ujjain Dewas Rd, opposite Ashray Hotel, Santram Sindhi Colony, Sant Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: A quite nice place for the wide range of product. Quality products, the staff members are humble. The one thing that is not good is it take more time in billing. It should be done faster.
Bakwas post sales services  No response after complaints. Never purchase further. 5 lac purchasing ib s year but no value.

A quite nice place for the wide range of all Electronic products. Electronic products like Air conditioner, Refrigerator, Deep freezer, Televisions, Washing Machines, Water Purifier, Smartphones, Bluetooth Speakers, Home-theatre, Soundbar, Laptop, Pendrives, and other accessories are available here with various options. Quality products, the staff members are humble. Specially I talk about Mr. Kamlesh Parmar who is so much dedicated and passionated towards his duty and he is so knowledgeable about the products. The one thing that is not good is the store have various options but it is overpriced! I Must say it is SO OVERPRICED! as compared to other electronic outlets. So, how can i get service or products from this store is a big question for all the consumers like me.

name: ORIGINAL ELECTRONICS
address: 37, Kshapnak Marg, in front of Police Control Room, Sethi Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
Bought a microwave and a TV, and I’m really happy with both! The prices were reasonable, and the staff was super helpful—not pushy, just genuinely knowledgeable. They took the time to explain the features and helped me pick the right models. Delivery and setup were smooth, and they even checked in afterward to make sure everything was working fine. Great service from start to finish. The owner takes the time to connect with customers, ensuring everyone feels valued and understood.
It felt more like a friendly visit than a transaction. Highly recommend!

Please consider 1 Star as Zero!

I had an extremely disappointing experience with Original Electronics. They misguide their customers and provide the worst after-sales service imaginable. The staff is unhelpful and dismissive, and even worse, the owner seems completely uninterested in addressing any issues. It appears he’s letting his lower-level staff make all the decisions, which is ultimately ruining his reputation in the market.

I strongly suggest avoiding this store and opting for online platforms instead, where you can do your own research and make an informed purchase. The staff at this store has the audacity to claim that negative Google reviews are fake, but they don’t have the courage to respond to them directly. I still have the invoice as proof of the poor experience I had, and once they’ve sold you the product, they couldn’t care less about your concerns. Do yourself a favor and steer clear of this place if you value good customer service and honesty.

Best service
Best deal
best behaviour
Thank you original mr.deepak ji

name: Factory Graded Shop
address: Trade Square Basement, Near Alakhdham Dharmshala, Freeganj, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
I have been attached with this firm by reference of my boss for last 10 years.
I have purchased nine products from here and fully satisfide with their services and price.
I have also given references to many of friends & relatives.It's best place to buy electronic
goods in Ujjain.The key feature of this firm is good staff, affordable price & best after-sale service.
I gave them 5 stars for their services & wish all the best for future .

I have never seen such low price shop in my total life I got 60 percent discount on water purifier which I have purchased three days before. There service team is too good and taking regular feedback from me. U enjoyed shopping with them

In current lockdown, I wanted to buy air cooler and due to lockdown it was not possible to go out of home and check for Air coolers, I contacted Factory Graded Shop and they did a video call and showed various models of air cooler and explained each product in detail. I booked air cooler online only and it was delivered within 2 hours.

I appreciate the service and customer satisfaction provided by Factory Graded Shop.

reviews.text: I bought a Mitsubishi from here which I couldn't find anywhere else in Ujjain,I was told in the market that 12 x 12 room would be enough for 1 ton but I was guided correctly here and they gave me 1.5 ton which is cooling really well,What can I say about the service, I did not understand anything in the remote, I called him, he immediately sent his executive and guided me properly, thank you Prince Ele.

reviews.text: A shop you would want to go... Not just for the name or brand value of the company but for the best quality of service that will be provided to you. Quick actions are taken for any registered complaint. And quality of service is not compromised at any cost.
Very good explanation by Rinku Ji on the products. I am very happy with the purchase experience. Will strongly recommend.

Worst servisce ever.... They never stand on their commitment. They attract you with there offer but after finalized the product they walk out from the their commitmes.. Also did not treat the customer well..  So customers be aware.. #jagograhakjago.

name: Alankar Electronics
address: Prakash talkies, Nai Sadak, Malipura, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text: I bought DC fan costs 1500/- from the alankar shop. Within 12 hours it stopped working. I m deeply saddened by service. Lost faith in alankar electronics. Not recommend to buy items as I m in Airforce and was taking item to long distance for easy life. Neither I can return nor they care.

This is a great place where I often find products that I do not get anywhere else in Ujjain. The rates are very very reasonable and the customer services are always nice. It's one of the oldest and most trusted shops of Ujjain. From years we have been visiting the shop for all our electronics needs.

My husband bought DC fan with battery from Alankar shop. Within few hours it stopped working. He is posted to remote area and was facing electricity problem. He is in train now and going again to that place. We kept faith on shop. Now it is not possible to return the item from that distance of 3200 km. Kindly understand the situation of a Defence person. Nobody loves a soldier until the enemy is at the gate.

name: Mi Store - Ujjain
address: Dr shyama Prashad Mukharji Shopping Complex, 04, Nanakheda, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text:
I would rate this store as 5 star just because it's a mi store here you will find all the mi product at the original price as on the online mi store. I loved the service i went there to buy note 10 pro. And loved it
I just request the owner to add there no over the map .

With utmost patience they handled all my queries...they know customer service I must say ( atleast more than sales people from so many other stores in Indore🙄😕) as they listened each and every thing that I was looking for in a led tv...they understood and suggested the exact tv i was looking for...I bought one for myself and m Happy!!!!
Well, i definitely recommend this mi Store,as it has wide range of latest products....

i went there twice but the price on the online mi store nd offline store was different then i get to know this is not an official mi store anymore it used to but not now i don't know what these guys are doing they are spoiling mi reputation i hope Xiaomi will take strict action against them lastly i had a bad experience there i won't recommend anyone to go there if you wanna buy something online store are still better then this one...#peace🤘

reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with Dash Computer Shop. The staff was knowledgeable, approachable, and quick to assist with my queries. The quality of products and services exceeded my expectations, and the pricing was fair and transparent. They truly stand out for their dedication to customer satisfaction. Highly recommended!

Making money is not important,making emotion is very important
Without being bossfull, they helps us like a family

"I'm impressed with Dash Computer's exceptional service! Mr. Harsh Jain, the owner, and his team provided wonderful support throughout my experience. Products are genuine and of high quality, exactly as described. Staff is knowledgeable, friendly, and responsive. I appreciate the transparency and honesty in their dealings, making me feel confident in my purchase. Prices are competitive and products are authentic. I highly recommend Dash Computer for reliable and trustworthy computer solutions. Mr. Jain's leadership has clearly set a high standard for customer satisfaction. 5-star rating well deserved!"

name: New PC Gallery
address: Shop No, Shape Arcade, Sethi Building, 1, Ujjain - Maksi Rd, near Pakiza Freeganj, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456010, India

reviews.text: The build quality is excellent, and everything runs smoothly. They also offer great after-sales support and genuinely care about customer satisfaction. If you're looking for a reliable place to buy a new PC or upgrade your current one, I highly recommend New PC Gallery!"

The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable, and patient – they answered all my questions and explained everything clearly. The PC was ready on time and the performance is excellent. I also appreciate their after-sales support – very professional and responsive.

recently bought a custom-built PC from New PC Gallery, and I couldn’t be happier with the experience. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable, friendly, and patient in helping me choose the best setup for my needs. They explained every component in detail and made sure I got the best value for my budget.
